summary:
After graduating with a Master's degree in Marketing and Brand Management in France, I moved to the Netherlands where I started working as a member of the European Marketing and eCommerce team at Medline Europe.

I am a positive, enthusiastic team player and I truly value respect, trust and honesty on a work and personal level. My work experience taught me a lot about diverse international working cultures. I am adaptable to different work environments and I am always eager to learn.

Profile:

• Online marketing experience (eCommerce, CMS, Email, Social, Content Marketing, SEO, PIM database, basic HTML, Photoshop Element)
• Ability to work in an international environment
• Affinity with the medical industry and B2B sector
• Calm and positive temperament
• Enthusiastic team player
• Creative thinker, out of the box solutions, always looking for alternatives to make things work
• Willing to do what it takes to get a project done
• Helicopter view, analytical and methodical approach
• French native, English fluent

profile_positions.description: Digital Marketing & Communications Manager at ROCKWOOL Core Solutions
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing & Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Medline is a global health care company providing medical and surgical supplies throughout North America, Europe, Asia, Australia and New Zealand. I currently work as the Senior Social Media & eCommerce Specialist at the European headquarters based in the Netherlands. 

In my role, I am responsible for the Medline websites and social media marketing. I am part of the e-commerce project team executing various tasks, such as the creation of documents and processes, providing and coordinating website content ensuring proper SEO settings. I work closely with our developers on testing and bug reporting to improve our website performance.

In addition, I manage the social media team and I overview the European social media strategy. I also work closely with the country marketing managers and product divisions on their marketing campaigns as a strategic partner to support and coordinate local web-related projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior eCommerce & Social Media Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Missions and responsibilities:
• Provide, execute, maintain social media strategy plan
• Develop and execute monthly reporting on social media
• Clean up, improvement, translation coordination of website content taking into consideration SEO settings and proper tracking
• Coordinate migration of website content to new platform
• Involved in the eCommerce project launch for Medline Europe 

Skills and Experience:
• Content Management System (Magento)
• Content marketing, management, editing and optimization
• Social media strategy plan, monthly reporting, content scheduling
• Facebook Ads Manager
• LinkedIn Campaign Dashboard 
• LinkedIn Recruiter Dashboard
• Photoshop Element
• Search Engine Optimization
• Email Marketing
profile_positions.title: Social Media & Content Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Missions and responsibilities:
• Social media strategy plan, monthly reporting, content scheduling
• Managing websites daily 
• Competitor benchmarking and analysis
• Support eCommerce project in terms of research, design, and other tasks
• Support to product divisions in their marketing projects

Skills and Experience:
• Content Management System (Oracle ATG & Magento)
• Content marketing, management, editing and optimization
• Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
• Basic HTML
• PIM Database
• Google Analytics
• Click Dimension
• Email Marketing
• Photoshop Element
profile_positions.title: Web Designer & eMarketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Main missions and responsibilities:
• Work closely together with the Communications and Brand Manager to promote the European Medline brand and events
• Work together with the Country Marketing Managers to customise the websites to the local markets
• Promoting and enhancing our online presence in the countries
• Work together with Product Divisions and the Marketing team to promote new products and improve product content on the website
• Developing and maintaining the front end functionality of the websites
• Search Engine Optimization (improving page content with industries specific keywords)
• Online content management
• Competitor benchmarking and analysis
• Launch of 2 new websites for Australia and New Zealand
• Launch of www.medline.eu for our European customers
• Web analytics monitoring and reporting 
• Promotion of the websites through emails, newsletters, bannering
• Social media: creation, launch, promotion and maintenance of the Medline Europe LinkedIn profile

Skills and Experience:
• Oracle ATG Web Commerce Business Control Center
• Oracle Endeca Search Engine
• Google Analytics
• SEO
• Basic HTML
• PhotoShop Element
• Web content management and content creation (English and French)
• Affinity with the medical industry
profile_positions.title: Junior Web Designer

profile_positions.description:
6-months internship assisting the E-commerce and Web Marketing Manager.

• Building and launch of 6 websites (English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Dutch)
• Promotion of the websites both internally and externally
• Online content management
• Translations from English to French
• Participation in product fairs (presentation of potential new products to the sales team)
profile_positions.title: Web Marketing Assistant

profile_positions.description:
9-months internship in web marketing (including 3 months part-time, alternated with studies) within the e-business company "​Boutique Katherine Roumanoff", designer and seller of baby products and furnitures.

Online communication: 
• Blog maintenance (writing article about childcare, new products, trends)
• Social networks animation (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Flickr)
• Newsletters (creation of content and templates)
• Adwords campaigns
• Organisation of contest to promote the brand (photo contest, quiz) 

Daily management of the website:
• Management of the orders
• Management of the stocks
• Logistics and supplier monitoring

Other:
• Customer service 
• After-sales service
• Partnership searching and monitoring
profile_positions.title: E-business Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Cashier and shelf stocker during Holidays
profile_positions.title: Employee
